metadata.name: Emotion concepts 2022
metadata.authors: Kwon, Mijin; Wager, Tor; Phillips, Jonathan

papers.title: Representations of emotion concepts: Comparison across pairwise, appraisal feature-based, and word embedding-based similarity spaces

metadata.description: (...) we collected pairwise similarity and appraisal feature ratings for 58 different emotion concepts and then employed representational similarity analysis to investigate the overlap between peopleâ€™s pairwise similarity judgments and emotion similarity in a 14-dimensional appraisal space and three word embedding spaces from two word2vec models (300 dimensions) and the newer GPT-3 model (12288 dimensions).
